QuestsSorted.NameClass:
if not InfoPanel then InfoPanelText = "Waiting for Job" InfoPanel = CreateFrame("Frame") InfoPanel:ClearAllPoints() InfoPanel:SetBackdrop({bgFile = "Interface/Buttons/WHITE8X8",}) InfoPanel:SetBackdropColor(0,0,0,.4) InfoPanel:SetHeight(40) InfoPanel:SetWidth(150)
InfoPanel.text = InfoPanel:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontNormal") InfoPanel.text:SetAllPoints() InfoPanel.text:SetText(InfoPanelText) InfoPanel.text:SetTextColor(1, 1, 0, 1) InfoPanel:SetPoint("RIGHT", -50, -100)
InfoPanel:SetMovable(true) InfoPanel:EnableMouse(true) InfoPanel:SetScript("OnMouseDown",function() InfoPanel:StartMoving() end) InfoPanel:SetScript("OnMouseUp",function() InfoPanel:StopMovingOrSizing() end)
InfoPanel.Close = CreateFrame("BUTTON", nil, InfoPanel, "UIPanelCloseButton") InfoPanel.Close:SetWidth(20) InfoPanel.Close:SetHeight(20) InfoPanel.Close:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", InfoPanel, 3, 3) InfoPanel.Close:SetScript("OnClick", function() InfoPanel:Hide() DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("Info Panel |cffC41F3Bclosed |cffFFFFFFWrite /InfoPanel to enable again.") end)
SLASH_WHATEVERYOURFRAMESARECALLED1="/InfoPanel" SlashCmdList.WHATEVERYOURFRAMESARECALLED = function() if InfoPanel:IsShown() then InfoPanel:Hide() else InfoPanel:Show() end end end
robotManager.Helpful.Logging.Write("Bambo's Vanilla Quester for Alliance is being loaded."); wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.SearchRadius = 120;
